version_description:
Thanks for playing <3

This first update contains:
- Fixes for a more stable streaming/recording experience
- Better handling in case of malfunctioning cloud saves

We are investigating several other issues so expect another update soon.

Thank you for playing <3

- Fixed recording preview issue on iPad
- Fixed GameCenter-related issues
- Fixed text rendering issue for users with a right-to-left OS language
- Fixed an issue with the game complete screen

Thank you for playing!
